animatedEmotes.name: Animated Emotes (Experimental)
animatedEmotes.description:
Renders animated emotes instead of static image.
WARNING: This is experimental option. This option can cause high memory usage.

doNotCheckForUnknownMessages.name: Do not check for unknown messages
doNotCheckForUnknownMessages.description: Turn this option on if you have issue with animated emotes, Such as animated emotes stuck at first frame.
